Headline: #90 Harlem Temporary Southbound Reroute near North Blvd/Forest Ave
ShortDescription: Southbound 90 Harlem buses are temporarily rerouted via Harlem, Randolph, Marion, South Blvd and Harlem: due to, street blockage near  North Blvd/Forest Ave.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #90 Harlem buses are temporarily rerouted via Harlem, Randolph, Marion, South Blvd and Harlem: due to, street blockage near  North Blvd/Forest Ave.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Yellow Line Service Temporarily Suspended
ShortDescription: Service on the Yellow Line has been temporarily suspended due to debris on the tracks.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Yellow Line has been temporarily suspended due to debris on the tracks.

Shuttle buses are available from Howard to Skokie to provide connecting service through the affected area.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

We are working to restore service as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Allow extra travel time.
